original_text: One day he went into the house to attend to his duties, and none of the household servants was inside.
korean_text: 그러할 때에 요셉이 그의 일을 하러 그 집에 들어갔더니 그 집 사람들은 하나도 거기에 없었더라

sentences.original_text: One day he went into the house
and none of the household servants was inside
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 집안의 종들은 아무도 안에 없었더라
